flavorText:
"Might doesn't just build empires. It protects them."
—Inti, Sun Empire knight

foreignData.flavorText:
„Macht errichtet nicht nur Imperien. Sie beschützt sie auch."
—Inti, Ritter des Imperiums der Sonne
foreignData.name: Kolossale Erhabenheit
foreignData.text: Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments und falls du eine Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder mehr kontrollierst, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"El poder no solo erige imperios, también los protege".
—Inti, caballero del Imperio del Sol
foreignData.name: Majestad colosal
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, si controlas una criatura con fuerza de 4 o más, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
« La puissance ne construit pas simplement des empires. Elle les protège. »
—Inti, chevalier de l'Empire du Soleil
foreignData.name: Majesté colossale
foreignData.text: Au début de votre entretien, si vous contrôlez une créature de force supérieure ou égale à 4, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"La potenza non si limita a costruire imperi. Deve anche proteggerli."
—Inti, cavaliere dell'Impero del Sole
foreignData.name: Maestà Colossale
foreignData.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, se controlli una creatura con forza pari o superiore a 4, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
「覇権は帝国を作り上げるだけではない。帝国を守っているのだ。」
――太陽帝国の騎士、インティ
foreignData.name: 巨大な威厳
foreignData.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがパワーが４以上のクリーチャーをコントロールしている場合、カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText:
"힘은 제국을 건설하기만 하는 게 아니야. 지켜 주기도 하지."
—태양 제국의 기사, 인티
foreignData.name: 거대한 위엄
foreignData.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신이 공격력이 4 이상인 생물을 조종한다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"A força não apenas constrói impérios. Ela os protege."
— Inti, cavaleira do Império do Sol
foreignData.name: Majestade Colossal
foreignData.text: No início de sua manutenção, se você controlar uma criatura com poder igual ou superior a 4, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Могущество не только строит империи. Оно защищает их».
— Инти, рыцарь Империи Солнца
foreignData.name: Колоссальное Величие
foreignData.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки, если вы контролируете существо с силой не менее 4, возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText:
「强威不仅能建立帝国；它还能守护帝国。」
～烈阳帝国骑士因缇
foreignData.name: 巨兽扬威
foreignData.text: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText:
「強威不僅能建立帝國；它還能守護帝國。」
～烈陽帝國騎士因緹
foreignData.name: 巨獸揚威
foreignData.text: 在你的維持開始時，若你操控力量等於或大於4的生物，則抽一張牌。

name: Colossal Majesty
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.

rulings.text: If you don't control a creature with power 4 or greater as your upkeep begins, Colossal Majesty's ability won't trigger. You can't take any actions during your turn before your upkeep begins.
If you don't control a creature with power 4 or greater as Colossal Majesty's ability resolves, you won't draw a card.

The creature with power 4 or greater that you control as Colossal Majesty's ability resolves doesn't have to be the same creature with power 4 or greater that was under your control as the ability triggered.
You draw only one card, no matter how many creatures with power 4 or greater you control.

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
